_meanings:
{@--2@} Any 
passage or word quoted from the Vedas,
a Vedic sentence; {#taTApi ca nigamo#}
{#Bavati#} (often found in Nirukta).

{@--3@} 

A work auxiliary to, and 
explanatory of, the Vedas; <ls>Ms. 4. 19</ls> and
<ls>Kull.</ls> thereon.

{@--4@} A sacred precept,
the words of a god or holy man.

{@--5@}
A root (as the source of a word).

{@--13@} Insertion of the name of a deity
into a liturgical formula.
